data.name: ELECTRIC
data.description: ELECTRIC: Electric fields Leveraged from multipole Expansion Calculations in Tinker Rapid Interface Code.

evidence: "This repository contains a driver that uses the MolSSI Driver Interface to perform electric field analysis of Tinker trajectories..." (domain-specific analysis tool, run as a program/driver).
"To get started with ELECTRIC, you should first clone this repository: git clone --recurse-submodules https://github.com/WelbornGroup/ELECTRIC.git" (distribution via cloning source repo).

"Upon successfull building, you will have the ELECTRIC driver in ELECTRIC/ELECTRIC/ELECTRIC.py" and usage examples like "python ${DRIVER_LOC} -probes ..." (run as an end-user analysis application that computes electric fields for research).
